body_html: Currently, to me it looks like TensorAccessor is CPU-only (in contrast to DeviceTensor, the strides+sizes aren't copied, as far as I can see; also the largest user of TensorAccessor seems to be sparse, but only on CPU).
body_text: Currently, to me it looks like TensorAccessor is CPU-only (in contrast to DeviceTensor, the strides+sizes aren't copied, as far as I can see; also the largest user of TensorAccessor seems to be sparse, but only on CPU).
body: Currently, to me it looks like TensorAccessor is CPU-only (in contrast to DeviceTensor, the strides+sizes aren't copied, as far as I can see; also the largest user of TensorAccessor seems to be sparse, but only on CPU).
